name: BOT-6505: Quick Step Tracking Validation
description: Simple, fast test to validate BOT-6505 step tracking fix. Verifies that satisfiedAtStep shows correct step numbers without Math.floor conversion.

compositeObjectives.name: Simple Step Tracking Test
compositeObjectives.description: Quick validation that step tracking works correctly

subObjectives.instructions: Say 'Hello' - bot should greet back. Should be satisfied at step 2.
Ask 'Can you help me?' - bot should offer assistance. Step tracking should be accurate.
Say 'Thank you' - bot should acknowledge. Final step validation.
